text: This is a list of select records in top-level international under-19 cricket (also known as youth cricket), which includes Test (multi-day) matches, One Day International (one-day) matches and Twenty20 International matches. The records are sourced from CricketArchive and ESPNcricinfo, and were last updated on 12 March 2020. ==Under-19 Test cricket== ===Team records=== ;Teams by date of first matchUnder-19 Test list of matches, CricketArchive.
